The real problem is hard to describe, as I said in #3447. It's the flag `FILE_FLAG_DELETE_ON_CLOSE` in the function `os.read` used by the package `tempfile` that prevents the file from opening the second time. To resolve this, there're two ways:
1. Introduce a Windows version of `os.read`.
2. Skip this test since loading from the handle can also test the functionality of serialization.
